thread.title: Sharp Tongue and Pencil: Meet the Judge Presiding Over the Government’s Case Against AT&T

author: Brent Kendall
title: Sharp Tongue and Pencil: Meet the Judge Presiding Over the Government’s Case Against AT&T
text:
WASHINGTON—As he presides over the trial of AT&T Inc.’s planned acquisition of Time Warner Inc., U.S. District Judge Richard Leon enters his courtroom each day clad in a bow tie and armed with a handful of pencils, which he often sharpens as the lawyers introduce themselves.
His comments from the bench can be even sharper.
